Status Anxiety x Iceland

COLLABORATION PROPOSAL

Oh hey Status Anxiety
Let's roadtrip around Iceland together and make some magic.

I've got a vision.


I've an exciting road trip planned in Iceland in end of March and wanted to bring Status Anxiety along! We can take advantage of the lack of tourists in Iceland at the moment. This rare opportunity allows me to create content in Iceland's most famous spots with your product in these locations. Together with Status Anxiety we can turn it into an epic road trip, mountain tracking with your amazing backpacks.


Two weeks of road trip in end of march I will be cruising around Iceland, drinking delicious coffee in the morning before heading out capturing photo content for your social media as well as promoting Status Anxiety to my audience.


Photography is about storytelling; it’s about capturing an experience. I found photography through my love of adventure, travel and exploration and feel there’s so much more behind every image than can be summed up through a single photograph. Through my work I try to capture the essence of the moment, expressing the atmosphere and emotions felt at the time to bring the audience along for the ride. In every project I aim to build a whole body of work that includes a variety of shots to capture the lifestyle and experience around the shoot.

ABOUT ME

Micro-influencer, photographer, web developer and social media content creator. I am passionate about outdoor traveling, lifestyle and female entrepreneruship. I love helping brands capture the essence of their personality and really telling a story through my work.


My biggest passion is to circle the globe promoting scenic destinations, unique brands and stunning landscape. My overall goal of my brand is to not only inspire women to get out and experience the beauty of the world, but live the life they want to live.


I'll be traveling with a full professional setup - Canon 5D mk IV, Canon R, Mavic Drone, ready to create high resolution content for your brand. I love nothing more than to create beautiful imagery and content for brands and together we can make magic happens.

THE EXPERIENCE

I've worked with local brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, and tour companies. I’m highly adaptable with my work, so whether I’m shooting in a cozy cafe, or halfway up a windswept mountain, I’m comfortable and confident with my abilities. My real passion lies in the outdoors and I am experienced in hiking, camping, climbing, as well as being cold, tired, and hungry. I’m comfortable and relaxed in all situations, and with a passion for travel I’m prepared to go anywhere in order to get the shot.

From the streets of Reykjavik Iceland to the highlands, we want to see it all tracking with Status Anxiety backpacks.

My Pitch

In exchange for providing 2x backpacks and 1x think it over T-shirt I could offer you...

  • 5x high resolution professionally edited photos, for your own use.
  • Mention in a minimum of 5x times Instagram stories on my instagram account.
  • 1x dedicated Instagram posts tagging @status_anxiety
